name: patrickjtoy.data
description: Simple immutable data structures in Javascript
author: Patrick J Toy

scripts.test-boolean: babel src/Boolean.js -o lib/Boolean.js ; babel tests/Boolean.spec.js -o lib/Boolean.spec.js ; node lib/Boolean.spec.js
scripts.test-enum: babel src/Enum.js -o lib/Enum.js ; babel tests/Enum.spec.js -o lib/Enum.spec.js ; node lib/Enum.spec.js
scripts.test-maybe: babel src/Maybe.js -o lib/Maybe.js ; babel tests/Maybe.spec.js -o lib/Maybe.spec.js ; node lib/Maybe.spec.js
scripts.test-number: babel src/Number.js -o lib/Number.js ; babel tests/Number.spec.js -o lib/Number.spec.js ; node lib/Number.spec.js
scripts.test-list: babel src/List.js -o lib/List.js ; babel tests/List.spec.js -o lib/List.spec.js ; node lib/List.spec.js
scripts.test-tuple: babel src/Tuple.js -o lib/Tuple.js ; babel tests/Tuple.spec.js -o lib/Tuple.spec.js ; node lib/Tuple.spec.js
scripts.test: yarn build ; yarn build-tests ; node lib/Boolean.spec.js ; node lib/Enum.spec.js ; node lib/Maybe.spec.js ; node lib/Number.spec.js ; node lib/List.spec.js ; node lib/Tuple.spec.js
